data.oai_dc:dc: Table S1. A synthesis of taxa (species and genera) exhibiting ballistic–ant diplochory, collated from an exhaustive literature review. The list does not include plant genera for which we have only anecdotal reports.Table S2. Sampling information and dry mass of diaspore components for 90 Euphorbia species and Mercurialis annua (Euphorbiaceae).Table S3. Data of seed dispersal distance in ballochory and myrmecochory.Table S4. Data of seed dispersal distance and seed mass of diplochorous species.
